Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, just south of the Founder's Fountain.
Room.LongDescription: There is a rather nice-looking fountain on the north side of the road on the Iilandi University campus. The fountain has been dedicated to the founding pioneers in the sciences. The University gives out an award each year on the basis of science, and new inductees get their names put on the plaques around the fountain.
